text: Phoenix Amongst The Ashes is the fifth album by the band Hate Eternal, released on May 10, 2011. Frontman Erik Rutan commented that "the band has come up with one of [their] heaviest, most twisted, evil, melodic, and insane albums yet". The album was recorded in MANA Recording Studios. ==Track list== ==Personnel== * Erik Rutan - guitars, vocals * JJ Hrubovcak - bass * Jade Simonetto - drums ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Hate Eternal albums Category:Metal Blade Records albums Category:Albums produced by Erik Rutan
title: Phoenix Amongst the Ashes
